newsItem.headline: MULCH ISLAND
newsItem.bodyText:
Flights are now leaving to go to Mulch Island! Mulch Island is a new discovery in the bin! Fly over to it now and hunt for the golden coin buried in the sand - it's worth 50 Mulch!
Happy Weeviling!

newsItem.headline: HORRID HENRY HUNT!
newsItem.bodyText:
Horrid Henry is back in the brand new DVD Horrid Henry and the King of Bling !

To celebrate the release of the new DVD, we've let Horrid Henry himself take over Bin Weevils with his very own Horrid Henry hunt!

Meet Henry and 3 of his friends by searching around the Binscape and you'll be rewarded with an awesome trailer for the new DVD, Mulch and even a chance to win your very own copy of the DVD! Happy Hunting!

newsItem.headline: It's BOOMco Time!
newsItem.bodyText:
BOOMco is here and to celebrate, we’ve set up a whole area dedicated to the awesome new blasters!

Head to the Shopping Mall and enter the BOOMco shutter to be transported to the brand new BOOMco hangout area. Enter competitions, collect your very own BOOMco wall poster, play games, find out all about the different blasters and much more!

newsItem.headline: FURBLINGS ARE HERE!
newsItem.bodyText:
Furby is back in the Binscape with Furby Furblings!

Head to the Furblings HQ at Gong's Pipenest to watch exclusive new videos, grab info on the Furby app, hang out with the new generation of Furby Boom colours and more!

Can you find all 6 of the Furblings around the Binscape? There's plenty of Mulch to be won if you can!

newsItem.headline: MY LITTLE PONY
newsItem.bodyText:
The next episode of My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic Series 3 is out now at Rigg's Multiplex!

Join Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash and the rest of the gang in Ponyville where you can watch all new episodes, grab yourself a handful of awesome downloads, earn nest items, win prizes and much more!

newsItem.headline: HARVEY DREW IS HERE!
newsItem.bodyText:
Harvey Drew and the Bin Men From Outer Space is the brand new book from Cas Lester filled with adventure, space and...rubbish?!

Head to Flem Manor Library now where you'll be greeted with an exclusive extract of the new book to read!

newsItem.headline: FRUBES GIVEAWAY!
newsItem.bodyText:
If you haven't managed to earn all of the Frubes Academy contestant posters then now's your chance!

We're giving away all of the Frubes Academy posters with just one simple click. Enter the Frubes Academy area at Slam's Party box and start any of the games to instantly receive that contestants poster!

But you better hurry as this weekend is your last chance to get the exclusive posters and transform your nest into a Frube-tastic wonderland!

newsItem.headline: TIMMY FAILURE!
newsItem.bodyText:
Timmy Failure is back and he’s about to crack the biggest case of his generation.
But someone is clearly trying to game the system. Bamboozle. Hoodwink.

So, naturally, he has to guard against the one thing that can bring him down:
SHENANIGANS.

Timmy and Total set up their new office in the Binscape last year, and the office has now re-opened for business!

Visit Total Failure, Inc. outside Rum's Airport now to watch videos, read extracts, and win 10,000 Mulch as well as a copy of Timmy Failure: Now Look What You’ve Done.

newsItem.headline: FRUBES ACADEMY GAME ON!
newsItem.bodyText:
Have you played the Frubes Academy games yet?

There are 6 awesome games in total, one for each of the Frubes Academy contestants. There's also a hi-score leaderboard for each game so try and beat your friends to the top and become number one!

There's plenty of Mulch to be won every day as well as 6 amazing Frubes Academy character posters for your nest. There's even a super secret nest item hidden in one of the games so complete them all to find out where it is!

Head to Slam's Party box to enter the Frubes Academy area now!

newsItem.headline: FRUBES ACADEMY WINNER!
newsItem.bodyText:
The Frubes Academy votes have been counted and the winner has been announced!

Can you guess which of the Frubes Academy characters took the top spot? Head to the area at Slam's Party box now to find out!

newsItem.headline: MYSTERY NEST ITEM!
newsItem.bodyText:
Have you played the Frubes Academy games yet?

If not then now's your chance! We've hidden a secret mystery Frubes Academy nest item in one of the them and all you have to do is complete the games to find out which of the 6 games we've hidden the nest item in!

Head to the Frubes Academy area at Slam's Party box now!

newsItem.headline: THE LEGO MOVIE!
newsItem.bodyText:
The LEGO Movie has assembled in Bin Weevils!

Head to Flem Manor and enter the LEGO portal to be transported to the world of The LEGO Movie

Join Emmet, Batman, Wyldstyle and the rest of the LEGO gang and grab free nest items, enter awesome competitions, play games and much, much more!

newsItem.headline: WIMPY KID IS BACK!
newsItem.bodyText:
Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Third Wheel is out now in paperback so we thought we'd celebrate in style by revamping Flem Manor Library with some new and exciting Diary of a Wimpy Kid awesomeness!

Head there now and vote for your favourite Diary of a Wimpy Kid book,read a hilarious extract, enter our amazing competition to win a SIGNED copy of the book and more!

newsItem.headline: HOW YOUR BODY WORKS!
newsItem.bodyText:
How Your Body Works is back in the Binscape!

Head to the Shopping Mall now and enter the giant Billie Bones to be transported inside the world of the human body!

Play games, enter competitions for massive amounts of Mulch, read all about the cool How Your Body Works mag and more!

You can even help create your own Billie Bones in our Build Your Body mission! Five of his body parts have been spread out across the Binscape and you have to find them all to put him back to together again!

newsItem.headline: FRUBES ACADEMY!
newsItem.bodyText:
THE FRUBES ACADEMY HAS TAKEN OVER SLAM'S PARTY BOX!

There are 6 amazing Frubes character games to play, each with their own unique poster up for grabs for your nest! Can you beat your friends to the top of the game leaderboards?
You can also enter our amazing Frubes competition to win a massive 50,000 Mulch!


And don't forget to vote for your favourite Frubes contestant! We'll announce the Frubes Academy winner once all the votes are in!

newsItem.headline: WIN AN IPAD MINI!
newsItem.bodyText:
If you head over to the Cupets site right now by clicking HERE, you'll be in for a chance to win an AMAZING iPad Mini as well as 20 super cool Cupet toys.

Head there now and good luck!

newsItem.headline: Adventure Sketchers
newsItem.bodyText:
Head to the LeapFrog Adventure Sketchers area outside the Shopping Mall and have a go at sketching your very own hero!

Tink and Clott have had a go too so be sure to take part in our Tink & Clott Sketch-Off vote to decide whose is the best whilst you're there!

Draw, play and create with LeapFrog Adventure Sketchers!

newsItem.headline: SKYLANDERS ARE BACK!
newsItem.bodyText:
How well do you know the world of Skylanders? Find out with the brand new Skylanders A-Z of Skylands Book!

Head to Flem Manor library now and test your knowledge with our ultimate Skylanders Quiz. You can even take a sneak peek inside the fab book with our exclusive extract AND win your very own copy in our amazing Skylanders competition!

newsItem.headline: Visit The Dinosaurs!
newsItem.bodyText:
Have you entered the prehistoric world of Walking With Dinosaurs?

If you haven't then head to Slam's Party Box! and travel back in time to the land of the giants!

Meet Patchi, Juniper and the rest of the Dino-gang. Play games, win prizes, learn all about the upcoming film and much, much more!

newsItem.headline: Can you be the best?
newsItem.bodyText:
Top the leaderboards with the brand new Nerf levels for both Mega Centurion and RapidStrike competitions!

It's unlimited ammo so take aim and become the best!

newsItem.headline: VIP PETS ARE HERE
newsItem.bodyText: Head to Gong's Pipenest and enter the VIP Pets Brilliant Beauty Salon!. There's tons to do with amazing prizes to be won, nest items to own, awesome downloads to grab and plenty of info on each of the VIP Pets.

newsItem.headline: CLOUDY 2
newsItem.bodyText: Head to the Cloudy with a chance of Meatballs 2 area to pick up a brand new 'Steve the Monkey' nest item! You can fly to the Cloudy with a chance of Meatballs 2 area from Rum's Airport, or why not click one of the four 'foodimals' now hanging around the Binscape to go straight there!

newsItem.headline: SKYLANDERS
newsItem.bodyText: Skylanders are back with the all new Skylanders Swap Force! Head to Slam’s Party Box to be transported to the world of Skylanders! Play our exclusive Swap Force game, learn about the all new characters, win plenty of Mulch and much, much more!

newsItem.headline: TEKSTA ROBOTIC DOG!
newsItem.bodyText: Get ready for launch! Teksta the robotic puppy has arrived in the Bin and is gearing up for his biggest adventure yet: SPACE!Enter the Teksta Mission Control outside Rum’s Airport and play the Teksta Training game and Parachute Training game every day to get Teksta ready for his mission. The more you play, the more Teksta will learn for his record-breaking adventure!

newsItem.headline: FURBY EXPERIENCE
newsItem.bodyText: Share your Furby Boom experience with your friends by sending them a Furby friendship card! Head to the Furby Boom area at Gong's Pipenest now!

newsItem.headline: CLOUDY 2
newsItem.bodyText: Cloudy with a chance of Meatballs 2 is here and to celebrate, you can now fly to the tantalisingly tasty world through Rum's Airport! Head there now to play ton's of chewy games, enter our crunchy competition, earn our delectable nest items and much, much more!

newsItem.headline: HEROES OF OLYMPUS
newsItem.bodyText: From the author that brought you Percy Jackson and The Lightning Thief, we're proud to announce the brand new Heroes Of Olympus book, The House Of Hades, here in the Binscape! Head to Flem Manor library to read an exclusive chapter of the new book!

newsItem.headline: LEAPPAD ULTRA
newsItem.bodyText: The LeapFrog LeapPad Ultra is back! Head to the LeapPad Ultraverse by zooming up the Ultra tube outside Flem Manor and you'll be transported to space! Test your skills with four amazing LeapPad Ultraverse missions and become an Ultra Bin Weevil!

newsItem.headline: EPIC IS HERE!
newsItem.bodyText: Join Mub, Grub and the rest of the EPIC gang outside the Shopping Mall! There's lots to do with hilarious trailers to watch, fantastic nest items to earn and even a Mub & Grub Garden Inspector Takeover where you can win one of the rarest items on Bin Weevils; a solid GOLD Mub & Grub garden statue! Not only that but there's also 3 EPIC games dotted around the Binscape for you to play and earn Mulch!

newsItem.headline: SKY SPORTS GAME
newsItem.bodyText: Sky Sports Game Changers has entered the Binscape with an exclusive competition where you can win a whole range of awesome sports equipment! There’s 3 footballs kicking around the Bin Weevils world so if you spot them, give them a click and enter for your chance to win! Remember, Game Changers is on Saturday’s at 9AM on Sky Sports 1.

newsItem.headline: HOBBIT INTERVIEWS
newsItem.bodyText: Watch 3 exclusive Bin Weevils interviews with the cast from the movie The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey and find out which colours they would pick for their Bin Weevils accounts. Watch now on the What's New Blog.

newsItem.headline: TRADE BIN BOTS
newsItem.bodyText: Bin-tastic news, Bin Bot collectors! Bin Tycoons can now trade their Bin Bots with other Bin Tycoons…so if you’re missing that special bot you need for your collection, just find a buddy who’s got an extra! You can swap your bots as many times as you like, for FREE! To get started, click on the Bin Bots Portal inside the front room of your nest!

newsItem.headline: FAN ART
newsItem.bodyText:
How cool would it be to see your artwork up in the spot lights?! Very cool indeed! Check out some Bin-tastic Bin Weevils artwork on the FAN ART page. If you would like to share your Bin Weevils artwork with us then please send it to, pics@binweevils.com


You can learn how to draw a Bin Weevil on the Fun Stuff page.
